stanza.line: If there be nothing new but that which isis
Hath been before how are our brains beguiledbeguiled
Which labouring for invention bear amisamis
The second burthen of a former childchild
O that record could with a backward looklook
Even of five hundred courses of the sunsun
Show me your image in some antique bookbook
Since mind at first in character was donedone
That I might see what the old world could saysay
To this composed wonder of your frameframe
Whether we are mended or whether better theythey
Or whether revolution be the samesame
